comment: The extended real numbers restricted to ` RR* \ { -oo } ` form a commutative monoid. They are not a group because ` 1 + +oo = 2 + +oo ` even though ` 1 =/= 2 ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Nov-2014.)
